doc.field: 14 gelatin silver prints, 11 x 14 in. and smaller. Portraits of children, pets, Albert Einstein (1946), and a self portrait. Other photographs include cows moving across the Hungarian countryside, Mexican men gathered on a stoop, and elderly farmer and his wife in the Adirondack Mountains. All are signed or initialed.
